description: The Yemeni military says it has targeted a U.S. vessel and several destroyers with naval missiles and drones in the Red Sea in support of Palestinians in the Gaza Strip, amid the Israeli genocidal war on the besieged territory with the U.S. support.
title: Yemeni army strikes U.S. vessel, destroyers

description: The United Nations Palestinian refugee agency is at “risk of death” after a string of donors suspended their funding over Israeli allegations some staff took part in the October 7 attacks by Hamas in southern Israel, UNRWA chief Philippe Lazzarini said.
title: UNRWA chief: UN Palestinian refugee agency at risk of death

description: The head of the International Committee of the Red Cross said the war in Gaza has "ruptured any sense of a shared humanity."
title: ICRC: War on Gaza has ruptured any sense of a shared humanity

description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan compares Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to the world history's worst dictators: Adolf Hitler, Joseph Stalin and Benito Mussolini.
title: Turkish president likens Netanyahu to infamous dictators

description: The Palestinian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has accused the international community of falling for Israeli “blackmail” as it buys time to carry out the “extermination” and forced displacement of the Palestinian people.
title: Palestinian Foreign Ministry: Intl. community falls for Israeli blackmail

description: Senator Bernie Sanders has slammed U.S. lawmakers over the “absurd” hypocrisy of expressing concern over the suffering of Palestinians while continuing to support Israel’s war in Gaza.
title: Bernie Sanders slams Congress over ‘absurd’ hypocrisy on Gaza

description: The Indian government should cease all ties with Israel that implicate it in the "ongoing genocide" in Gaza, an Indian human rights group has said, referencing a recent report that an Indian company had sent combat drones to Israel for potential use in Gaza, according to Middle East Eye.
title: Human rights group urges India to cease military ties with Israel

description: Several thousand protesters gathered in the center of the British capital London calling for an immediate ceasefire in the Gaza Strip.
title: Protesters in London denounce Israeli massacres in Gaza

description: The Lebanese Hezbollah resistance movement says it has struck Israeli troops near the border with southern Lebanon in response to the regime’s ongoing genocidal war in Gaza, and in support of Palestinian fighters facing off a relentless offensive.
title: Hezbollah says attacks Israeli troops with heavy-caliber Burkan missile

description: TEHRAN - Siasat-e-Rooz devoted its note to the fake gesture of the Westerners in support of women and wrote: In a thought-provoking move, the Western media, including foreign Persian-language media, declared that a group of employees of several embassies based in Tehran in a common message congratulated the International Women's Day and encouraged the addressees to try to advance women's rights and eliminate gender inequality.
title: An absurd humanitarian gesture

description: TEHRAN - In preparation for his upcoming diplomatic mission to Brazil, Abdollah Nekounam, the recently appointed ambassador of the Islamic Republic of Iran to Brazil, met with Hossein Amir Abdollahian, the Iranian Minister of Foreign Affairs.
title: Iran's new ambassador to Brazil starts mission

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian foreign minister criticized the U.S. for its inconsistent actions and lack of commitment within the framework of diplomatic efforts to remove sanctions on Iran.
title: Iran censures U.S. lack of commitment to lifting sanctions

description: TEHRAN- A military advisor to the Commander-in-Chief of the Iranian Armed Forces has emphasized the indispensable role of national authority and strength, asserting that in dealing with corrupt powers, it is imperative to speak the language of power.
title: National authority key to safeguarding Iran’s rights: military advisor

description: TEHRAN - In a recent statement, the ambassador of the Islamic Republic of Iran to Pakistan expressed optimism about the growth of relations between Iran and Pakistan under Asif Ali Zardari's presidency.
title: Iranian ambassador to Pakistan expresses optimism for strengthened ties

description: TEHRAN - General Ahmad Ali Goodarzi, the border commander of the police force, has reported a recent clash with a terrorist group attempting to infiltrate the country for sabotage purposes.
title: Iranian border guards thwart terrorist infiltration attempt

description: TEHRAN – Iran has condemned the United Nations for releasing baseless and biased information as facts, while it continues to turn a blind eye to the devastating situation of women and children in the besieged Gaza Strip.
title: Iran slams UN for politically motivated reporting on 2022 riots

description: TEHRAN- Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian has slammed the decision by Meta to suspend the Instagram accounts of the Leader of Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei.
title: Iran FM says suspension of Leader social media accounts ‘illegal and unethical’

description: TEHRAN- The military spokesman for the al-Qassam brigades has spoken about the genocidal Israeli war on Gaza, events on the battlefield, and the escalation of resistance in the month of Ramadan.
title: Hamas: ‘Israeli occupation won’t rest in Gaza’

description: TEHRAN - In June 2019, when Donald Trump announced on Twitter that he had canceled planned attacks on Iran just 10 minutes before they were set to occur, clueless Democrats seemed to dismiss his claims as mere bluffs.
title: Exclusive: Trump ordered attacks on Iran without Congress' knowledge

description: TEHRAN- A United States plan to construct a port in Gaza with the purported aim of getting more humanitarian aid into the Palestinian territory by sea has been greeted with deep skepticism.
title: U.S. seeks military presence near Gaza

description: TEHRAN- Following hundreds of Palestinian women’s deaths and injuries in Israel’s ongoing genocidal attack on Gaza, Iran’s top human rights official has demanded that Israel should be expelled from the UN Commission on the Status of Women.
title: Iran urges removal of Israeli regime from UN women’s rights commission

description: TEHRAN-Iranian short film “Sampo” written and directed by Marzieh Riahi has won an award at the 27th Malaga Film Festival in Malaga, Spain.
title: Iranian short film “Sampo” wins first award at Malaga Film Festival

description: TEHRAN-The closing ceremony of the 1st Qeshm Oud Festival was held on Friday at the Portuguese Castle in Qeshm Island in the Persian Gulf, and winners of different sections received their awards.
title: 1st Qeshm Oud Festival concludes at Portuguese Castle in Persian Gulf

description: TEHRAN-The 13th edition of Tehran International Animation Festival (TIAF)came to an end on Friday, honoring the winners in different categories.
title: Tehran Intl. Animation Festival announces winners

description: TEHRAN- The Cinematheque of the Iranian Artists Forum (IAF) will screen a restored version of Hong Kong film director and screenwriter Wong Kar-wai’s acclaimed drama “In the Mood for Love” on Monday.
title: Tehran cinematheque to screen “In the Mood for Love”

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s women’s team claimed the title of the 2024 Asian River Rafting Championships.
title: Iranian women crowned Asian rafting champions

description: TEHRAN – As a notable step intending to conserve natural treasures, two precious wonders located in Iran's ​​​​​Sistan-Baluchestan province have been enshrined in the natural heritage list.
title: 120-year-old fig tree, coastal gem join Iran’s national heritage list

description: TEHRAN - In a vibrant celebration of culinary heritage, the Samanu festival was held in Bojnourd in collaboration with the municipality and the Cultural Heritage Department of North Khorasan province on Friday.
title: Samanu festival celebrated in Bojnourd

description: As the first light of dawn graces the sky with hues of gold, a familiar scene unfolds in an old neighborhood of Isfahan. In a modest workshop, the master artisan Aliakbar awakens to begin his daily ritual. His hands, weathered by years of dedication, deftly navigate the intricacies of Kolah Namadi making, a craft passed down through generations.
title: Timeless art of making traditional felt hats: enduring legacy of Iran’s nomadic culture

description: TEHRAN – On March 17 and 18, tens of amateur astronomers gathered under a dark starry sky on the edge of Iran’s central desert to observe the annual Messier marathon, famed as the country’s biggest astronomical event.
title: Messier marathon brings amateur astronomers to Iran’s central desert edge

description: IranianAttorney.info - Changing a child custody agreement is a legal process that involves specific steps and considerations. The ability to modify a custody arrangement depends on various factors, and seeking the assistance of an Iranian Divorce Lawyer is often crucial in navigating this complex legal terrain.
title: Iranian Divorce Lawyers & How to Change Custody Agreement

description: TEHRAN – A delegation of Chinese media influencers recently visited cultural heritage sites along segments of the ancient Silk Road situated within Iran’s Semnan province.
title: Media influences from China tour Silk Road heritage in Semnan province

description: PersianLawyer.net - Artificial Intelligence (AI) is increasingly making its presence felt across various industries, and the legal field is no exception. In the realm of law, AI is being utilized to streamline processes, enhance efficiency, and provide valuable insights.
title: Iranian Criminal Lawyers & Role of Artificial Intelligence in Law

description: TEHRAN – Asghar Nazemi was elected as head of the polo (known as ‘chogan’ in Persian) federation of Iran on Saturday for a four-year term till 2028.
title: Asghar Nazemi elected head of Iran Polo Federation

description: TEHRAN – Iran lost to Japan 17-13 in the final match of the 2024 Asian Age Group Championship on Saturday.
title: Iran water polo team runners-up at 2024 Asian Age Group

description: TEHRAN – Following Iran’s policy of expanding health centers, Iraq has embarked on building such centers to provide basic medical services to people, Hani Musa Badr al-Aqabi, the Iraqi deputy health minister, has said.
title: Iraq adopts Iran’s policy to build health centers

description: BEIJING- China’s ministers of education, human resources and social security, housing and urban-rural development, as well as the director of the National Disease Control and Prevention Administration answered the questions raised by the media regarding education, employment, social security, housing, healthcare, and disease control in a press conference on Saturday.
title: Chinese ministers answer questions regarding social issues in press conference

description: TEHRAN – Iran and Russia have signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) to cooperate on ethics in Artificial Intelligence (AI).
title: Tehran, Moscow to cooperate on AI ethics

description: TEHRAN – More than 200,000 out-of-school children have been identified in the current academic year, beginning on September 23, 2023, and measures are being taken to help them continue their education, Education Minister Reza-Morad Sahraee has said.
title: More 200,000 out-of-school children identified

description: TEHRAN - TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), fell 1,994 points (0.09 percent) to 2,163,757 on Saturday, which is the first day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX falls over 1,900 points on Saturday

description: TEHRAN - Iran is now self-sufficient in supplying airplane spare parts, and there is almost no need to send airplanes to foreign countries for any kind of repair, an official told Mehr News Agency.
title: Iran self-sufficient in producing passenger plane spare parts

description: TEHRAN – The managing director of the Water and Sewerage Department of Tehran Province has said wastewater projects worth 120 trillion rials (about $240 million) are going to go operational in the capital soon, IRNA reported.
title: Wastewater management projects worth $240m to go operational in Tehran

description: TEHRAN – The value of Iran’s exports of agricultural and foodstuff products increased by 23 percent in the first 11 months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023-February 19, 2024), the spokesman of the International Relations and Trade Development Committee of Iran's House of Industry, Mining and Trade said.
title: Agro-food exports rise 23% in 11 months on year

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Transport and Urban Development Minister Mehrdad Bazrpash has outlined three major strategies for the Ports and Maritime Organization (PMO) to pursue in the next Iranian calendar year, which begins on March 20.
title: Transport Ministry outlines 3 major strategies of PMO in upcoming year

description: TEHRAN - Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi inaugurated several major projects during his provincial visit to Khuzestan in the Southwest of the country on Friday, IRNA reported.
title: Raisi inaugurates major projects in southwestern Iran

description: TEHRAN –A group of African ambassadors and chargé d'affaires visited Barkat cancer hospital in Tehran on Friday.
title: African envoys visit cancer specialty hospital

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s second-largest automaker, Saipa, has reported a six percent decline in the number of passenger cars it has produced in the first 11 months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023- February 19, 2024).
title: Iran’s second-largest carmaker reports decline in output
Freight transit in Shahid Rajaee Port up 89%

description: TEHRAN - Iranian volleyball expert Mahmoud Afshardoost believes that the appointment of Mauricio Motta Paes as the head coach of the Iranian national volleyball team requires patience and has urged people to not rush to any 'hasty judgement' about the Brazilian coach.
title: Volleyball expert Afshardoost urges fan to not rush to 'hasty judgement'
